texts.name: Oldarf
texts.biography: Oldarf was a royal knight who did not know defeat, but his enemies did not sleep and deceived him at the tournament and he was driven out, but voices from the void promised him to return his former glory and power.

specialty.description:
{Knights and Fallen Knights}

Increases the Attack and Defence of any Knights for Fallen Knights each level attained after 6th level.
